author: coffeebank
install_msg:
Thanks for installing, I hope you enjoy :) To stay up to date with breaking changes, you might want to join my Support Discord. To find documentation, Discord, and more, drop by the website at <https://coffeebank.github.io/coffee-cogs/kodict>

**Note: This cog recommends using (free) API keys from Krdict (한국어기초사전) and DeepL for the best experience.**
See the documentation site above for more setup details.
name: kodict
description: Korean dictionary bot. Searches National Institute of Korean Language's Korean-English Learners' Dictionary (한국어기초사전), translates Korean using DeepL, and resources including Wiktionary, Google Translate, and romanization.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
